bill.title: Environmental Control
bill.description: Provides requirements for claiming certain site rehabilitation costs in applications for contaminated site rehabilitation tax credits; revises DEP reporting requirements regarding site rehabilitation; transfers certain authority over expedited permitting & comprehensive plan amendment process from OTTED to Secretary of Environmental Protection, etc.
